trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Elmira
There were no other sightings in Elmira on or around January 20th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst of all, the event took place on Jan. 20, 2003, but your form would not letme put in the proper year.I was on my way home from my Mothers home, traveling south on route 14, comingfrom schyler county into chemung county. I first spotted the object in MilportNY. At that time the object was heading in a southerly direction. I lost sightof the object for quite a while. I was traveling at about 50 miles a hour andit was moving rapily away from me.When I got into Elmira NY, I spotted the object again over an appartment houselocated on Davis st. in Elmira. The object hovered over the building for a longtime. I heard no noise coming from the object. I would have to say that theobject was a grey to a darker color. The object was rounded in the rear andpointed at what I thought was the front. I only saw yellow and orange lights onthe object. It never moved from the last spot I saw it. I dove the rest of theway home wondering what it was that I had seen. I have used my uncles E-mail asI do not have a computer. However, he is willing to relay any questions thatyou may have to me.
